Name: Special parking for accessible for-hire vehicles.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to special parking for accessible for-hire vehicles.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Transportation
This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

	Section 1.  Section 19-164 of chapter 1 of title 19 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended to read as follows:
	ยง19-164 Special parking for wheelchair accessible vans and accessible for-hire vehicles.  Any wheelchair accessible van or accessible for-hire vehicle, as such term is defined in section 19-503.2 of this title, licensed by the taxi and limousine commission actually in the process of boarding or discharging [wheelchair passengers] physically disabled persons, or escorting [wheelchair passengers] such persons to and from their destination, shall be permitted to park in any area in which a vehicle with a special vehicle identification permit is permitted to park. 
 ยง2. This local law shall take effect ninety days after it is enacted into law. 

LP
LS#779
4/12/06, 1:15 p.m.
